SELECT ENROLL_DATE, SUM(SALES_PRICE) AS SALES_PRICE, SUM(ORD_PRICE) AS ORD_PRICE, (SUM(SALES_PRICE)-SUM(ORD_PRICE)) AS NET_PRICE FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN S.ENROLL_DATE IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(O.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(S.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS ENROLL_DATE, CASE WHEN S.SALES_PRICE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE S.SALES_PRICE END AS SALES_PRICE, CASE WHEN O.ORD_PRICE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE O.ORD_PRICE END AS ORD_PRICE FROM (SELECT S.ENROLL_DATE, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS SALES_PRICE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO INNER JOIN BRCH B ON S.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO WHERE S.CNL_DATE IS NULL AND B.BRCH_NO = 2 GROUP BY S.ENROLL_DATE) S FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT O.ENROLL_DATE, SUM(OI.PRICE) AS ORD_PRICE FROM ORD O INNER JOIN ORD_ITEM OI ON O.ORD_NO = OI.ORD_NO INNER JOIN BRCH B ON O.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO WHERE O.STAT_CODE = 0 OR O.STAT_CODE = 2 OR O.STAT_CODE = 4 OR O.STAT_CODE = 5 OR O.STAT_CODE = 6 OR O.STAT_CODE = 8 AND O.BRCH_NO = 2 GROUP BY O.ENROLL_DATE) O ON S.ENROLL_DATE = O.ENROLL_DATE)
WHERE ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')
WHERE ENROLL_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')
WHERE ENROLL_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')
GROUP BY ENROLL_DATE ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SALES_NO) AS NUM, BRCH_NO, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_TIME, SALES_NO, CARD_PAY, CASH_PAY, (CARD_PAY + CASH_PAY) AS TOT_PAY, TO_CHAR(NVL(CNL_DATE, TO_DATE('1111-11-11','YYYY-MM-DD'))) AS CNL_DATE FROM (SELECT NVL(B.BRCH_NO, A.BRCH_NO) AS BRCH_NO, NVL(B.ENROLL_DATE, A.ENROLL_DATE) AS ENROLL_DATE, NVL(A.SALES_NO, B.SALES_NO) AS SALES_NO, NVL(A.PRICE, 0) AS CARD_PAY, NVL(B.PRICE, 0) AS CASH_PAY, NVL(A.CNL_DATE, B.CNL_DATE) AS CNL_DATE FROM (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE, S.CNL_DATE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 0 AND BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE('2021-07-01', 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.CNL_DATE ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) A FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, SUM(SM.CNT * PM.MENU_PRICE) AS PRICE, S.CNL_DATE FROM SALES S INNER JOIN SALES_MENU SM ON S.SALES_NO = SM.SALES_NO INNER JOIN POS_MENU PM ON SM.MENU_NO = PM.MENU_NO WHERE PAY_METHOD = 1 AND BRCH_NO = 2 AND S.ENROLL_DATE = TO_DATE('2021-07-01', 'YY/MM/DD') GROUP BY S.BRCH_NO, S.ENROLL_DATE, S.SALES_NO, S.CNL_DATE ORDER BY S.SALES_NO) B ON A.SALES_NO = B.SALES_NO AND A.BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO AND A.ENROLL_DATE = B.ENROLL_DATE) ORDER BY SALES_NO
